text: Old Brampton is a village in Derbyshire, England. It lies 3 miles to the west of Chesterfield, on a spur of higher land between two small valleys. The appropriate North East Derbyshire Ward is called Brampton and Walton. The population of this ward at the 2011 Census was 3,676. The Peak District National Park lies about 2 miles to the west. ==In Culture== Old Brampton is mentioned in the Domesday Book as one of the manors belonging to Walter D'Aincourt.Domesday Book: A Complete Translation.
